com.jakewharton.android.actionbarsherlock
Class ActionBarMenuItem

java.lang.Object
  com.jakewharton.android.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarMenuItem

public final class ActionBarMenuItem
extends Object

An implementation of the android.view.MenuItem interface for use in inflating menu XML resources to be added to a third-party action bar.

Author:
Jake Wharton
See Also:
com.android.internal.view.MenuItemImpl}

Constructor Detail

ActionBarMenuItem

public ActionBarMenuItem(Context context,
                         int itemId,
                         int groupId,
                         int order,
                         CharSequence title)
Create a new action bar menu item.

Parameters:
context - Context used if resource resolution is required.
itemId - A unique ID. Used in the activity callback.
groupId - Group ID. Currently unused.
order - Item order. Currently unused.
title - Title of the item.
